product_name: MilaniKeep It Full Glossy Plumping Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilani Keep It Full Glossy Plumping Balm, a 3-in-1 multitasker that delivers serious shine, balm-like comfort & both immediate and long-term plumping.
details: DetailsFeaturesHigh-shine, high-comfort formula with a gentle cooling sensation1% Maxi-Lip clinically proven to increase lip volume after 4 weeks of daily useConditioning blend of mango seed butter, apricot oil, pomegranate oil & Kalahari melon oil to nourish and moisturize100% saw a clinically measured increase in lip moisture by an average of a 22.5% after just 1 application*100% felt lips were hydrated, nourished and instantly softer & smoother*93% felt all-day hydration and saw smoother looking lips over time**Based on consumer perception & clinical testingtingBenefitsVegan & cruelty-freeMade in KoreaItem 2633069How To UseTwist the base 1-2 clicks to dispense the desired amount of balm. The lip pen does not retract. For more intense color, apply additional layers.IngredientsBallet: Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire microcristalline, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Wax, Methyl Lactate, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Lactic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Rosin, Barium Sulfate, Aluminum Hydroxide Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).
how_to_use: Twist the base 1-2 clicks to dispense the desired amount of balm. The lip pen does not retract. For more intense color, apply additional layers.
ingredients: Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire microcristalline

reviews.headline: Nice, but not enough color
reviews.comments: I like these type of lipstick/glosses, but this one doesn't have much color.  I do like the "plumping" sensation when you put it on, but I prefer other brands for the pigment.  I would still recommend to a friend because it's a nice gloss, but I find that I must wear it over something.

reviews.headline: love!!
reviews.comments: bought both spice and hazel def will need to buy more!! it is the perfect amount of gloss and slides on super nicely! they are pretty sheer so it is buildable but def recommend!!

reviews.headline: Enhances natural lip color
reviews.comments: I really like this balm! I got the color 'honey' and it enhances the natural color of my lips. I just use it with a nude lip liner and I really like how it looks. I already have decently plump lips as it is so I wasn't buying this for the plumping effect, but I do think it makes lips look nice and has a slight plumping effect. It doesn't sting either. I would like to try another color as well!

reviews.headline: Creamy!
reviews.comments: This is like if lipgloss and lipsticks had a baby. It's not too sheer and not too thick. Very moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Very moisturizing
reviews.comments: Just enough tint and feels good

reviews.headline: Definitely would buy this again
reviews.comments: Amazing and makes my lips soft

reviews.headline: I will not buy this
reviews.comments: No color

reviews.headline: Almost like Mario's
reviews.comments: I love Makeup by Mario's Moisture Glow Plumping Lip Serum.  It always feels so good on my lips, but at $24 a pop its not an everyday lippie.  This Milani Keep it Full Glossy Plumping Balm is a very close second and priced for daily use!

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Would buy again!

reviews.headline: Finally!
reviews.comments: I still remember an old balm i had in a squeezy tube by Nivea called A kiss of shine. It was discontinued eons ago but this took me right back. 20 yrs later. I got spice color and its beautiful. I feel it on my lips which I want but its not gloppy or oily and it doesnt dry quicklyI. m definitely getting more!!!

reviews.headline: no plumping? no problem!
reviews.comments:
I do not like strong plumping lip glosses/balms.  So when I received this, I read the description that said it was mild w a slight minty tingle. 
I was very pleased when I used it! As someone who does not want a strong burn, it is perfect. Very glossy, easy to apply. I have since purchased Jam and love it! Great color.
will definitely buy more!!

reviews.headline: Got as a free gift and so happy i did
reviews.comments: I love me a good lip product and honestly any other time i wouldve overlooked this product primarily cause im not a huge fan of milani. But the formula and colorpayoff on these lip gloss balms are chefs kiss. Also super hydrating and not overly plumping. Personally i love it and in comparisoj to other high end brands i dont think yiu can beat it. I received the shade ballet and its defiitely a cool toned pink a little sheer but you can see that pjnk color. Love love love will be purchasing almost the rest of the collection

reviews.headline: not plumping
reviews.comments: did not plum at all

reviews.headline: Very glossy lip plumper
reviews.comments: Although this does plump my lips a little, it is very glossy, so a little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing, not plumping
reviews.comments: I didn't not realize it was more of a lip balm than a lip plumper. It moisturizes 100%, but the "plumping" effect is just a cooling sensation.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This is the second tube that I have purchased I. Spice. I love its texture and creaminess. I only wish it stayed on longer.

reviews.headline: Love the shine and plump!
reviews.comments: Great shine to my lips. The plump is not overwhelming. The lipstick goes on very creamy. I'm very pleased with the product.

reviews.headline: I'm in love with this product!
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this!  This is my first time to write a review - ever!  I always read reviews before I purchase. I bought the color Moi.  It is so pretty and natural. I have a medium complexion and it's perfect.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love the color and it makes my lips soft

reviews.headline: So Good
reviews.comments: Really soft and creamy wash of color. I got the color Bisou and its that perfect sheer reddish berry shade. Looks so so pretty on. Plumping effect is light, feels cooling.

media.headline: Plumpworthy lips that speak for themselves!
media.caption: Keep it full Glossy Plumping Balm Shade 'Hazel'

faceoff_positive.comments: What a beautiful lip balm! I bought this in the shade Hazel and Moi and they are both absolutely gorgeous. Feel so hydrating on the lips when I apply, but also makes my lips look fuller and plumper. No stinging! I LOVE that over time the ingredients in these makes your lips look softer, fuller and more plumper. That was my main reason for purchasing because I do not want lip fillers and prefer natural aging. I am 36 years old and these are perfect for me; they are sleek and slender and I can throw them in my makeup bag, my purse, my small Gucci or my gym bag for a touch up. I just low how the application looks initially though; such a beautiful gloss finish. Milani kills the lip game and of course, you can't beat the price point. Love you Milani for affordable AND luxury cosmetics!
faceoff_positive.headline: Plumpworthy lips that speak for themselves!

faceoff_negative.comments:
This is a nice lipgloss. The color is beautiful, and it's easy to handle and apply. Instead of pushing a button like other cream lipgloss plumpers, you twist the bottom to move the color up. You can see it move up easier than others so you know how much product you are using.
While I love the color and will continue to use this product, I didn't notice any lip plumping or even the tingling you normally get from those types of products. At first I thought it was because I used a heavy lip treatment before using the gloss. The next use I didn't have the treatment and still didn't notice anything.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice color, minimal "plumping" effect

rollup.name: Keep It Full Glossy Plumping Balm
